TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Threading.Tasks.Task<O> PromptValidator<R,O>(TurnContext context, R value);
.class public auto ansi sealed PromptValidator`2<R, O> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function PromptValidator(Of R, O)(context As TurnContext, value As R) As Task(Of O)
type PromptValidator<'R, 'O> = delegate of TurnContext * 'R -> Task<'O>

Docs.param: PromptValidator.context Context for the current turn of conversation.
PromptValidator.value The value that was recognized or `undefined` if not recognized.
Docs.summary: Signature of a handler that can be passed to a prompt to provide additional validation logic or to customize the reply sent to the user when their response is invalid.
